title: Presentation to MD/PhD Students
text:
RDoC Cognitive Systems GWAS (R03 MH123787)


Project Goals:

Investigate latent molecular genetic architecture of working memory
Use existing COGENT consortium data
Identify genome-wide allelic variation
Focus on causal, not just correlational relationships

title: Presentation to MD/PhD Students
text:
Working Memory as RDoC Construct


Core RDoC Cognitive Systems Domain
Active maintenance of goal-relevant info
Resists interference
Limited capacity system
Highly heritable trait

title: Presentation to MD/PhD Students
text:
Project Innovation

Large-scale dataset (COGENT)
Novel analytical methods
Focus on causality
Pathway to treatments
Transdiagnostic implications

title: Presentation to MD/PhD Students
text:
Early Development & Brain Function (R01 DK110793)


Research Focus:

Impact of early feeding practices
Human milk oligosaccharides (HMOs)
Effects on obesity development
Brain development trajectories



Longitudinal design
Multi-modal assessment
Developmental outcomes
Clinical implications

title: Presentation to MD/PhD Students
text:
AHRQ ADHD Review Project (75Q80120D00009)


Update to 2018 AHRQ review
Focus on diagnosis and treatment
Children and adolescents
Evidence-based guidelines
Treatment recommendations

title: Presentation to MD/PhD Students
text:
Integration & Clinical Impact
How these projects work together:

Genetic architecture → Treatment targets
Early development → Prevention strategies
Clinical guidelines → Evidence-based care
Translational potential → Improved outcomes

title: Presentation to MD/PhD Students
